The following bar plot shows probability of declaring efficacy for each scenario and decision criterion (number of events).
The strong scenario simulates hazard ratios from a prior based on historical data.
Under the "no efficacy" scenario, the hazard ratio equal to 1, and the probability of efficacy should not exceed 5%.

```{r}
library(targets)
tar_read(plot)
```

The following table shows the average number of years from first patient visit until control patients can be rescued.

```{r}
library(gt)
tar_read(table)
```
